title: Making Introductions
description: Practice introducing yourself and getting to know someone in a social setting

steps.name: initial greeting
steps.instruction: Greet the person with a friendly opening appropriate for a social setting.
steps.completion_criteria: The person responds to your greeting and engages in conversation.

steps.name: self introduction
steps.instruction: Introduce yourself by sharing your name and a brief, appropriate detail about yourself.
steps.completion_criteria: You have shared your name and at least one personal detail.

steps.name: learning about them
steps.instruction: Ask the person about themselves, showing genuine interest in who they are.
steps.completion_criteria: The person shares their name and at least one personal detail about themselves.

steps.name: finding common ground
steps.instruction: Identify and discuss shared interests or experiences to build rapport.
steps.completion_criteria: You have identified at least one common interest or experience.

steps.name: future contact
steps.instruction: Discuss the possibility of meeting again or staying in touch.
steps.completion_criteria: You have exchanged contact information or made plans to meet again.

steps.name: ending
steps.instruction: End the conversation politely with a friendly farewell.
steps.completion_criteria: Both parties exchange goodbyes and the conversation concludes naturally.
